name: They Come At Night (Virtual Turtle)
description:
'They Come At Night's is a creepy first person shooter in which you defend a house from killer robots. Survive all 7 ways to survive the night. Keep barricading the windows, because the robots will find every hole and enter through it!

Controls: 

Left Mouse Button - fire shotgun

Right Mouse Button / E - Barricade window

Left Shift - Sprint

Warning: game can be experienced as creepy, or horror by some. While the game is not graphically horrifying, the sound effects can make it quite eerie. Play at own caution.

Made in 1 week, for the Brackeys 2020.1 gamejam!

Credits - Everything was self-made except for:

  • Music: Youtube Audio Library
  • Sound Effects: Youtube Audio Library (but self-edited)
  • Enemy animations: Adobe Mixamo
  • Font: Dafont

P.S. The level design in it's current state is just a block-out of the layout. I did not have time to model all elements of the house, which is why the house is low-detail. This will be adressed in a future update!
